front.title: A taxonomy of multicast security issues

abstract.t: With the growth and commercialization of the Internet, the need forsecure IP multicast is growing. In this draft we present a taxonomy of multicast security issues. We first sketch some multicast groupparameters that are relevant to security, and outline the basicsecurity issues concerning multicast in general, with emphasis on IPmulticast. Next we suggest two 'benchmark' scenarios for securemulticast solutions. Lastly we review some previous works.
